articles.title: New Fossil Discovery Sheds Light on Tyrannosaurus Rex's Earliest Known Relative - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Restudy of fossils collected in New Mexico digs up key clues about T. rex’s origins in North America. A new study published in Scientific Reports reshapes our understanding of how the most famous dinosaur to ever walk the earth – Tyrannosaurus rex – first arr…
